thread.title: Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian are followed by Keeping Up cameras as they head for lunch in LA
thread.title_full: Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian are followed by Keeping Up cameras as they head for lunch in LA

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian are followed by Keeping Up cameras as they head for lunch in LA
text:
Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian are followed by Keeping Up cameras as they head for lunch in LA It's well and truly back to business for the Kardashian klan Share Kim, Khloe and Kourtney grab lunch (Photo: Splash News) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Filming of Keeping Up With The Kardashian came to a screeching halt following Kim Kardashian's Paris robbery. 
But it looks like it's well and truly back to business for the Kardashian clan. 
Following on from their well-publicised trip to Costa Rica, Kim, Kourtney and Khloe Kardashian were all pictured heading for a bite to eat at Casa Vega in Sherman Oaks, Los Angeles, on Wednesday. 
Kim, who is gradually ditching her thigh-skimming, form-fitting skirts and dresses in favour of tracksuits and baggier garms, was dressed in a loose pair of black velvet trousers and a leather jacket. Khloe and Kourtney (Photo: Splash News) Kim kardashian (Photo: Splash News) Kourtney Kardashian and Khloe Kardashian (Photo: Splash News) Kourtney Kardashian (Photo: Splash News) 
Finishing off her look, Kim wore an oversized pair of mirrored sunglasses and black ankle boots. 
Kourtney and Khloe were a little less conspicious, with middle sibling Khloe rocking a simple tight mesh cream top and jeans, and Kourt in a plunging number and similar jeans. 
Showing lots of love for one another, the pair were pictured sharing a sweet hug as they left the restaurant following their meal. Kourtney Kardashian (Photo: Splash News) Khloe and Kourtney (Photo: Splash News) Kim kardashian (Photo: Splash News) Khloe and Kourtney (Photo: Splash News) Read More Model claims she's the mystery girl Scott Disick flew to Costa Rica during Kardashian-Jenner family holiday 
Their very public outing comes as the famous family's recent holiday was branded a 'sham'. 
Instead of relaxing, the mum-of-two did four set-up photo shoots over five days for a new edition of her Selfish book. 
They also worked 12-hour days filming series 13 of Keeping Up With The Kardashians. 
“The holiday was a sham staged just for the show – no one had so much as an hour off without the cameras in their face or a photographer taking pictures,” a source told Heat magazine. 
“Kris [Jenner] is making up for lost time. Production on the show shut down for a while after Kim got robbed in Paris, so she’s really pushing to get some good footage now.” 
The source continued: “Wake-up call was 6am. The family brought two personal trainers with them, so there was an hour of working out, then two hours of bikini shoots or filming in bikinis, before a liquid breakfast to avoid bloating.” Like us on Facebook
